text: Odashirogahara is a marshland located near Nikkō in Tochigi Prefecture, Japan, west of the river Yukawa. It is about 650,000 m², west of Senjōgahara. All private car traffic is banned in this area to keep the area free from pollution. In place are low emission buses which shuttle visitors back and forth to Nikkō. ==References== Category:Wetlands of Japan Category:Landforms of Tochigi Prefecture Category:Ramsar sites in Japan
title: Odashirogahara
